segments.text: I will never forget Linda . After all , she was my first lover .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you ’ ll lay it to rest with the time flying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I remember that someone says that it is difficult to forget the people who don ’ t want to forget .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I think time can change everything .
segments.speaker: S2
